title: Ticket #1048: The condor_soapshell should be built nightly
description:
The condor_soapshell source code is in the repository, but is not being built.

We should edit the top level imakefiles to build the soapshell, albeit for the time being not package it.
remarks:
2010-Jan-20 07:27:54 by tannenba:
Change pushed to V7_4-branch and merged to master. Note that a make release will not copy the condor_soapshell binary into the release (as desired at this time), but the wsdl file will still be copied. I am willing to live with this, since doing anything about it would require more hassle than it is worth.

Resolving.
check_ins:
2010-Jan-20 07:23   Check-in [16921]: Merged [16920], Merge branch 'V7_4-branch' (#1048) Conflicts: src/Imakefile (By Todd Tannenbaum )
2010-Jan-20 07:13   Check-in [16920]: Build (but do not copy into the release_dir) the condor_soapshell when a make is issued at the top level src subdirectory. (#1048) (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: tannenba
